author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Accolades and 'Usual Suspects' Content Update Trailer for No, I'm Not a Human, a decision-based psychological horror game developed by Trioskaz. Players can garner the critical reception for the game and get the rundown for the 'Usual Suspects' Content Update, bringing 12 new characters, a new bonus ending, added events, Steam trading cards, and more. The 'Usual Suspects' Content Update for No, I'm Not a Human is available now for PC (Steam).
title: No, I'm Not a Human - Official Accolades and 'Usual Suspects' Content Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin was the star of a new trailer at The Game Awards and gave fans a look at co-op raids, multiverse exploration, and much more. In this adventure inspired by the anime series, players will travel across Britannia, glide between timelines, and take on massive bosses.

#IGN
title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin - Official Gameplay Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
title: What will the Stranger Things spinoff show be called? Wrong answers only. #strangerthings #ign

title: Now that Maya Hawke's mom is in Fortnite, we can now post this video lol #strangerthings #ign

author: IGN
title: Fat Pikachu Will Return in Avengers: Doomsday. (and hopefully some new Pokémon stuff too!) #pokemon

author: IGN
description: Watch the PC Release Date Announcement Trailer for EvoCreo, a creature-collecting turn-based RPG developed by Ilmfinity Studios. Players will embark on a grand adventure in Zenith to search for a missing father and hold those responsible to account. Find over 170 Creo to aid in battle, make use of unique Creo abilities, and expand the party for what lies ahead. EvoCreo is launching on January 7 for PC (Steam).
title: EvoCreo - Official PC Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
title: Iron Man 3 "villain" Trevor Slattery wants to help Simon become a movie star in Marvel's Wonder Man!

author: IGN
description: Check out the Story Trailer for Undefeated: Genesis, an open-world action-adventure superhero game developed by Indie-US Games. Players will step into the shoes of an average college student in one moment, and a powerful superhero in the next, harnessing deep abilities like laser beams, freezing blasts, and more. Customize a hero of the ages to make use of your powers for good and unravel the myriad mysteries in Undefeated: Genesis, launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).
title: Undefeated: Genesis - Official Story Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for The Last Ninja Collection + Bonus Games, a collection of retro arcade beat 'em up games developed by System 3 Software. Players can gain access to the entire Last Ninja series of C64 versions, along with Amiga and Spectrum versions, where available, including The Last Ninja, Last Ninja 2, Last Ninja 3, and Ninja Remix. The collection also packs International Karate, IK+, and Bangkok Knights, offering a robust slice of gaming history. The Last Ninja Collection + Bonus Games is available now on PC (Steam).

#TheLastNinjaCollection #Gaming #IGN
title: The Last Ninja Collection + Bonus Games - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer #2 for Wonder Man, the next action-adventure superhero installment in the MCU distributed by Marvel Studios. Explore the trials, tribulations, and adventures of Simon, Trevor, and more in Wonder Man, streaming on January 27 exclusively on Disney+.

Hollywood actor Simon Williams is thrust into the world of superheroes as he gets powers of his own, and becomes the new superhero Wonder Man.

Wonder Man stars Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Ben Kingsley, Demetrius Grosse, Lauren Glazier, Byron Bowers, and more. The series was created by Destin Daniel Cretton.

Wonder Man is streaming on January 27 exclusively on Disney+.

#WonderMan #Marvel #IGN
title: Wonder Man - Official Trailer #2 (2026) Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Ben Kingsley, Demetrius Grosse

author: IGN
description:
From PS5 exclusives such as Marvel's Wolverine and Saros, to third-party games that are coming to PlayStation like GTA 6 and Resident Evil Requiem, we take a look at everything to expect for your Sony console in 2026.

#IGN #PlayStation #2026Games
title: What to Expect from PlayStation in 2026

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at Early PvP Duel Gameplay for Hytale, an adventure creation RPG developed by Hypixel Studios. Players can get a look at some of the hectic and intense gameplay to expect in PvP for the upcoming game. See how some of the combat mechanics unfold through the use of dual-blades, axes, and more from both third and first-person perspectives. Hytale is launching into Early Access for PC on January 13.

For more information on the game, check out the Hytale website: http://www.hytale.com/

#Hytale #Gaming #IGN
title: Hytale - Official Early PvP Duel Gameplay
